for _ in range(int(input())):
 n = input()
 s=0
 for i in n:
  s+=int(i)
 if s<9 and len(n)!=1:
  print(9-s%9)
 else:
  print(min(9-s%9,s%9))

for _ in range(int(input())):
 n=input()
 sum=0
 len=0
 for v in n:
  len+=1
  sum+=int(v)
 rem=sum%9
 if len>1 and sum<9:
  ans=9-rem
 else:
  ans=min(rem,9-rem)
 print(ans)
